archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Bewaken Arbeidsomstandigheden (ARBO)
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: <languages xml:space="preserve"><nl-NL>Managen (advies over en beheren) van risico's arbeidsomstandigheden. Omvat o.a. ook BHV, preventie, keuringen, verzuimbegeleiding en re-integratie.</nl-NL><en-US>Managing risks in working conditions (including emergency response, prevention, inspections, absenteeism counseling, and reintegration.</en-US></languages>

properties.value: Managen (advies over en beheren) van risico's arbeidsomstandigheden. Omvat o.a. ook BHV, preventie, keuringen, verzuimbegeleiding en re-integratie.
Managing risks in working conditions (including emergency response, prevention, inspections, absenteeism counseling, and reintegration.
